description: This file contains utility functions for DOM manipulation, such as querying elements, creating elements, rendering content, clearing nodes, event delegation, and some internal helper functions. It serves as a general utility module for DOM interactions in a frontend project.

methods.name: isElement(value)
methods.description: Checks if a value is a DOM Element, DocumentFragment, or Text node, using duck-typing or instanceof checks depending on environment.

methods.name: appendChild(parent, child)
methods.description: Appends a child or array of children to a parent node. Converts non-Node values to text nodes.

methods.name: applyProps(el, props = {})
methods.description: Applies a set of properties to a DOM element, supporting classes, styles, datasets, event listeners, and attributes.

methods.name: qs(selector, root = document)
methods.description: Query a single DOM element using a CSS selector within an optional root.

methods.name: qsa(selector, root = document)
methods.description: Query all DOM elements matching a CSS selector within an optional root, returning an array.

methods.name: create(tag, props, ...children)
methods.description: Create a DOM element with optional properties and children, supporting strings, nodes, and arrays.

methods.name: render(container, content)
methods.description: Render content into a container, replacing its existing children.

methods.name: clear(node)
methods.description: Remove all child nodes from a given DOM node.

methods.name: delegate(root, eventType, selector, handler, options)
methods.description: Set up event delegation on a root element, invoking a handler when an event target matches a selector.

ctags.name: delegate
ctags.pattern: /^export function delegate(root, eventType, selector, handler, options) {$/
